name: Saheby
details: Saheby application for completing Holy Quran.
Saheby focus on helping you finish reading Holy Quran with yourself or with groups.
Saheby divides Holy Quran for your with parts with your choice to simplify finish reading process.
Saheby also reminds you of reading each part in specific time you specify
Saheby also have the ability for listening to Holy Quran while reading it

name: Control City
details: Control City application for Car-Product parts, software, Ecu files.

Control City is an automative general application specialize in Car-Product parts, software, Ecu files, in addition to Key and pin codes of all car- Brands
in a premium user interface and easy to use options to achieve the optimal user experience and produce a high quality service to all users all over the world.

name: Easy Buy
details: Easy Buy installment sale service.
Through this service, the company provides its customers with the facility to own consumer durable goods with flexible installments.
Customers can avail this facility to buy a wide range of durable goods including electronics, home appliances and furniture from Al Adan partner’s outlets.
This service is designed to offer prompt approvals to eligible customers with simple documentation and flexible payments starting from KWD 5 per month.

name: Kashcool
description: Kashcool is an educational platform with an interactive content for kuwait curricula...
details: Interact with the book content in an interesting educational experience, using innovative studying means anywhere and anytime directly from the tablet, iPad, or computer.

Kashcool is the product of educational and technological experiences. It is the greatest educational platform in Kuwait, which provides the interactive educational sources. It contains an impressive collection of educational electronic books with the latest educational means, designed or the Kuawiti curriculum from grade k-1 (elementary) to grade -12 (secondary). It takes you to new educational fields that enable you to access all the lessons and information with one click.
